title: Exit door shall not open immediately upon a flight of stair
clause_text: Exit door shall not open immediately upon a flight of stair. A landing equal to at least the width of the door shall be provided in the stairway at each doorway. Level of landing shall be the same as that of the floor which it serves. Exit doorway shall be openable from the side which they serve without the use of a key.
